name: Matches That Matter
overview:
Matches That Matter is a social introduction service that helps single men and women over 40 find “the one.” We differ from other dating services by using a highly effective method for matching singles in a comfortable, low-pressure manner. We provide the opportunity to meet while working on non-profit community, arts and cultural projects. The projects, called “flights,” last for 3 weeks and the group meets three times. This allows relationships and chemistry to develop naturally.

This “frequency of contact” will allow you to see the real personalities of everyone involved. You won’t be put on blind dates or have to wade through fake or dishonest profiles online. You will also have the opportunity to increase your social network by making new friends.

Chemistry doesn’t happen online, it happens in person. With the Matches That Matter service, you’ll never make a relationship decision based on an online profile — our flights happen in real-time and so do your connections. We consider ourselves an offline service.
